dot.empire.myris.gfx

Class ShaderBatch

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch
      • dot.empire.myris.gfx.ShaderBatch
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Batch, com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable

    public final class ShaderBatch
extends com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch
    Brightness/Contrast SpriteBatch. Modify the brightness/contrast of sprites and images rendered in libGDX.
    See Also:
    LibGDX Brightness & Contrast
